'''The Sanctification of Tao Dou''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the EP album ''[[Azure Lantern, Jade Inkstone]]''.

== Lyrics ==
{| class="fandom-table"
!Chinese Transcript
!Pinyin
!Official English Translation
|-
|三家血染碧，八门骨带霜
|Sānjiā xuě rǎn Bì, Bāmén gǔ dài shuāng
|Red shall three bloodlines in the [[Bishui River|Bishui]] flow, the bones of [[Eight Adepts|eight heroes]] don frost and snow
|-
|月下呼舟取吾钩，砥柱中游
|Yuè xià hū zhōu qǔ wǔ gōu, dǐ zhù zhōng yóu
|Moon-graced by skiff my hook-blade I claim, as a pillar in the waters let it remain
|-
|刀剑浮沤，阴骘自周；命尔魂销魄散不得收
|Dāojiàn fúōu, yīnzhì zì zhōu; mìng ěr húnxiāo-pòsàn bùdé shōu
|The clashing blades like seafoam pass, each one their end fate will decide; but you, [[Tao Dou]], shall be cast down, your body and soul shall not abide
|-
|金戈铁马拿云意，碎玉天街击筑气
|Jīn'gē-tiěmǎ ná yún yì, suì yù tiān jiē jī zhú qì
|Cavalry gold and iron march, hearts stone-set on heaven's arch. Down starward street their mortal stride, and onward into myth they stride
|-
|唾壶冰心身死后，不落言荃水东流
|Tuòhú bīngxīn shēn sǐ hòu, bùluòyánquán shuǐ dōng liú
|For death stains not the virtues pure, and eastward flow vicissitudes sure
|-
|名朽灯火留
|Míng xiǔ dēnghuǒ liú
|Names shall fade, hope's flame endures
|}
